Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.metrics.impl

Class MetricRegistryImpl

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.metrics.impl.MetricRegistryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Metric, MetricRegistry, MetricSet
@Private public class MetricRegistryImpl extends Object implements MetricRegistry
Custom implementation of MetricRegistry.
